events.message: I recently purchased a pair of headphones but I want to request a refund because they do not meet my expectations.
The issue has been categorized under Refund following the customer's request for money back.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the headphones.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to initiate a refund for your recent headphone purchase. I am here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund so I can process it quickly?
The order number is 458792. The headphones do not fit well and have poor sound quality, so I would prefer to return them.
Thank you for the details. You can return the headphones within 30 days for a full refund. I will email you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply and the easy return process. I look forward to receiving the return label via email.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please ship the product back to complete the refund process. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and if you need any more help with your refund.
We are closing this case now that the refund process was completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on our service.
